title: (x) Simple sans on Cox Business website - Avenir {Jan E}
content:
what is this the font being used on this logo?

the word “business”

[http://www.coxbusiness.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821163943/http:/www.coxbusiness.com/ "http://www.coxbusiness.com/")

author: mandatorycannibalism

comments.content: CO of ‘COX’ is basically Futura. ‘Business’ is Avenir like most of the rest on the page.
